Pre-Game Insights: Anthony Edwards has made significant strides yearly, coming off a career season, averaging 25.9 points, 5.4 rebounds and 5.1 assists, shooting 46.1%, including 35.7% from 3 and 83.6% from the free throw line.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Edwards wants to unleash himself next year and go for the NBA MVP award, after being involved in those conversations last season.
Others: The two-time All-Star could have more leeway to take control of the Timberwolves offensively following Karl-Anthony Towns' departure.
Edwards also added to his defensive game and is one of the top two-way talents in the league.
